level.heading: Standards for safety belts.
level.text: Safety belts shall conform to applicable federal motor vehicle safety standards established pursuant to § 103 of title 1 of the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 (15 U.S.C. § 1392).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-73, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-1801.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: 15 U.S.C. § 1392, referred to in this section, was repealed in 1994 by P.L. 103-272, § 7(b). For present law, see 49 U.S.C. § 30101 et seq.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Expiration of Law 6-73: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50- 1801.
